title: Remote Work & Virtual Cards

sections.title: Working from Home
sections.content:
Many people work 'remotely' and need to manage business expenses.

- **Remote Work**: Working from home or a cafe, not the office.
- **Business Expense**: Something you buy for your work (e.g., a laptop).
- **Reimbursement**: When the company gives you the money back for an expense.
- **Receipt**: You must keep this to prove what you bought.

sections.title: Virtual Cards for Safety
sections.content:
Virtual cards are perfect for online work expenses.

- **Virtual Card**: A digital card in your app (no physical plastic).
- **Disposable Card**: A card that disappears after one use (very secure).
- **One-time use**: Used only once.
- **Instant Activation**: You can use it immediately after clicking 'Create'.

sections.title: Virtual Card Request
sections.content:
```mermaid
graph LR
    A[Open App] --> B[Cards Section]
    B --> C[Create Virtual Card]
    C --> D[Set Spending Limit]

    E --> F[Copy Card Number]
```

objectives: Identify expenses related to remote work (Internet, Hardware)
Understand the benefits of a virtual card for online security
Use 'Could I' to ask for a reimbursement or a new card

keyTerms.definition: A digital-only payment card with no physical form.
Money spent on something needed for work or business.
Repayment for money you have already spent.
